name: Bananaboys and Aliens
description:
Fight your way through the dessert of Texas and deliver as much bananas as possible. You play as Perez who has to deliver the bananas.

Escape the danger of the road and deliver as many bananas as possible.

After finishing, you can upgrade your abilities.

Controls: Skip the "place the crates on the car" bit: y

Jump (dodge stuff): c

Shoot and aim: Mouse

Features: If you manage to shoot a banana while it is in mid-air, you'll get it back, even if you already lost it.

Music: Rednecks with White Faces by Caühaüs

Programms used: BFXR for Soundeffects

Piktochart for shopscreen, finishscreen,

gameoverscreen etc.

gimp for sprites.

scratch2exe for exe conversion
